name: Roll & Solve
description:
Can you solve the puzzle with random spawned dices ?

tip: Dice 6 is not always good

tip2: Cant solve it ? Replay and get new dices then try again ! 💪

🎲Controls🎲

Press 1 to control dice number 1

Press 2 to control dice number 2

Press 3 to control dice number 3

Press 4 to control dice number 4

Press 5 to control dice number 5

Press 6 to control dice number 6

Pause button to pause the game.

Replay button to replay the level and roll the dice again.

Roll & Solve is a game built for GMTK game jam

The game is built in 2 days

The theme was:

Roll of the Dice

Credits: Levels Music: By bart https://opengameart.org/content/contemplation Main menu Music: By bart https://opengameart.org/content/contemplation-ii
